subject: Soccer
Discrimination
Grass
Women and Girls
Stadiums and Arenas
organizations: United States Women's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Sunil Gulati, the president of U.S. Soccer, said a “series of mistakes” led to a failure to ensure a field was suitable for an international women’s soccer match.
snippet: Sunil Gulati, the president of U.S. Soccer, said a “series of mistakes” led to a failure to ensure a field was suitable for an international women’s soccer match.
